inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Relapsing or having a progressive disease
inclusion.label: met

met
inclusion.evidence: Patient was Initially treated with melphalan and prednisone, followed by VAD regimen, and autologous stem cell transplant

inclusion.criterion: Female of child-bearing potential must have a method of birth control and a negative serum or urine beta--human chorionic gonadotropin (β-HCG) pregnancy test at screening

exclusion.criterion: Seropositive for HIV, or active hepatitis A, B or C infection

notes: 64yo woman with multiple myeloma and recurrent disease, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens including melphalan, prednisone, VAD, thalidomide, and velcade.
